description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，第十三届全国人民代表大会贵州省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a deputy from Guizhou Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省的省会，罗鹏的籍贯地。
description.en: The capital city of Hunan Province, China, and the ancestral home of Luo Peng.
The dominant ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表的统称，是中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: A collective term for deputies to the National People's Congress, who are members of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，罗鹏是长沙人。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Luo Peng is from Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，罗鹏是汉族。
description.en: According to the infobox, Luo Peng is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框和维基百科分类，罗鹏是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the infobox and Wikipedia categories, Luo Peng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，罗鹏被选为贵州省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Luo Peng was elected as a deputy from Guizhou Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 罗鹏担任第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Luo Peng served as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress.
